descriptions: Responsible for feeding, operating, and monitoring the production line, ensuring product quality and compliance with technical specifications. I perform basic equipment maintenance and troubleshoot operational issues. I also operate forklifts and lifting platforms as part of my daily duties.

Operated specialised industrial equipment, including mini loaders and mini excavators in a construction environment. Worked in an international context requiring communication in multiple languages, adapting to different work cultures and technical requirements.

Performed specialised tasks in the production of concrete sleepers, including demoulding, mould preparation, and operation of specific production line machinery. Maintained the workspace and equipment in optimal condition, regularly cleaning transport and concrete mixing machines to ensure quality and safety standards.

Responsible for feeding, regulating, and maintaining the proper functioning of glazing machines. Collected products from the glazing lines and carried out loading and unloading processes for ceramic items, ensuring products met the company's quality standards.

Provided personalised service and technical advice on electronic and multimedia products to customers. Collaborated in store organisation, product promotion, stock replenishment, and promotional signage. Developed advanced communication skills and in-depth knowledge of available technological products.
